Tunable.name: mbCleanBorderPixelBeforeBlur
Tunable.description: Allows to clear the border pixel of the generated intensity mask before blurring it. Can change how the edge will be blurred

Tunable.name: mbEnabled
Tunable.description: Turn On or Off the whole effect

Tunable.name: mBlurSize
Tunable.description: Defines the size of the radial blur kernel.

Tunable.name: mbPaddingBool
Tunable.description: This field is not used for anything at the moment.

Tunable.name: mbUseRawSunDir
Tunable.description: The sun position might be different from the 'adjusted' one used by the lighting manager. This option allows to pick the one to use for the ray's origin.

Tunable.name: mContribution_Blue
Tunable.description: How much the blue channel of the sky pixel matters to the ray intensity computation.

Tunable.name: mContribution_Green
Tunable.description: How much the green channel of the sky pixel matters to the ray intensity computation.

Tunable.name: mContribution_Red
Tunable.description: How much the red channel of the sky pixel matters to the ray intensity computation.

Tunable.name: mHorizonZLimit
Tunable.description: Defines the Z distance from the camera limit such that anything farther is considered part of the sky.

Tunable.name: mIntensity
Tunable.description: How overall the sky pixel color contributes overall the ray intensity computation.

Tunable.name: mMaxDistToSun
Tunable.description: Defines the maximal distance to the sun at which intensity will reach 0.

Tunable.name: mMinDistToSun
Tunable.description: Defines the minimal distance to the sun at which intensity will reach its max.

Tunable.name: mNumRadialBlurPasses
Tunable.description: Defines how many radial blur passes to perform.

Tunable.name: mPower
Tunable.description: Defines the a power exponent to apply to the computed intensity before blurring it.

Tunable.name: mRayColor_Blue
Tunable.description: Defines the blue scaler for the color of the ray when applying it.

Tunable.name: mRayColor_Green
Tunable.description: Defines the green scaler for the color of the ray when applying it.

Tunable.name: mRayColor_Red
Tunable.description: Defines the red scaler for the color of the ray when applying it.
